7.10

GENERAL

  • Enabled Dark Willow in Captain's Mode
  • Bounty Rune base gold bounty increased from 50 to 60
  • Bounty Rune no longer gives XP. Previously gave 0 at the start and increased by 7 per minute.
  • Tome of Knowledge XP bonus increased from 500 to 700
  • Melee Creeps gold bounty reduced by 1
  • Randoming now gives a Faerie Fire instead of a branch
  • Bonus hero count increased from 10 to 12

ITEMS

AEON DISK
  • Cooldown reduced from 100 to 90
BOOTS OF SPEED
  • Cost increased from 400 to 500
  • Movement bonus increased from 40 to 50
PHASE BOOTS
  • Movement bonus increased from 45 to 50
POWER TREADS
  • Movement bonus increased from 45 to 50
ANIMAL COURIER
  • Flying Courier movement speed increased from 450 to 460
MONKEY KING BAR
  • Added a sound effect for successful procs
SOUL RING
  • Health cost increased from 150 to 170

HEROES

ABADDON
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +50 Mist Coil Heal/Damage to +60
  • Level 20 Talent increased from +15% Cooldown Reduction to +20%
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +250 Aphotic Shield Health to +225

TALENTS
